law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Employees' system" has the meaning stated in § 31-101 of this title.
"Legislative body" has the meaning stated in § 31-101 of this title.
"Local pension system" means a retirement or pension system established by the legislative body of an eligible governmental unit.
"State system" has the meaning stated in § 20-101(pp) of this article.
"Withdrawal date" means the date that a withdrawal by a participating governmental unit from a State system takes effect.
